snippet.title: The Lost Vikings (GBA) - Part 1
snippet.description:
Here's part 1 of the Gameboy Advance version of the Lost Vikings, which contains the first four levels, of the Spaceship levels.

Note that the GBA version is for the most part the SNES version. I don't have that version yet, so this will do.

Of note, the Genesis version of the game has more levels and each episode has a comedic intro. But since my capture card doesn't work with my Genesis, this will have to do.

I might show the entire first game on the GBA, but we'll see.
